attributes.action: Create a UK based Nuclear Power Generation group to build and run the UK grid.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK has, and still is, producing,  world leading Nuclear Engineers and have developed world leading systems for Nuclear Power generation. Currently this expertise and knowledge is being exported to countries around the world. We are now allowing other countries to sell Nuclear schemes back into the UK. 
Why don`t we use this pool of knowledge directly for the benefit of the UK and keep control of our Electrical Grid.!
I do not know of any reason that would prevent the UK from doing this....!
attributes.background:
The UK is leading developer of Nuclear Power generation.
Why don`t we use this knowledge to design, build and run Nuclear Power stations for the UK. This would create massive employment opportunities and preserve the security of our National Electrical grid system.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We are not sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to directly build and own nuclear power plants if that is something you would like to see happen.
